title: HIGHschool/ UNI teams, thoughts???

embed.description: Whether you're playing Solo or Co-op with friends, League of Legends is a highly competitive, fast paced action-strategy game designed for those who crave a hard fought victory.

body:
so am i alone in thinking a game with possibly 
THE highest number of TOXIC PLAYERS, didn't need to go so far as advertising teams to schools in the name of sportsmanlike qualities and online well being... 

this to me seems like a crock of shite to keep their numbers up over at Riot, and im kinda wondering where they get their ideas from...
seriously, biggest MoBa, goes and adds the largest number of toxic players, and i mean ALOT, i used to play DoTa every night, there were some amazing people online. i would never think to mute all the people on my TEAM, that seems silly, BUT, thanks to riots game play and incentive system, here we are. In the last 5 years, this travesty (LoL) has ruined pretty much 80 percent of their online community, to the point where the regular fix is to "mute all players before each match" which correct me if im wrong is not how to 'build sportsmanlike qualities in younger gamer's'....

thoughts?
